original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nye bar rton pas brtan pa ste /🔽rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba'am /🔽bram za'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dag gam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nye bar rton pas brtan pa ste / rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba'am / bram za'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dag gam /
translated: This bodhisattva, because of the support of the roots of virtue, is firm.🔽He is born into a great sāla tree-like royal family,🔽or into a great sāla tree-like brahmin family,

original: khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur /
translated: or into a great sāla tree-like business family,

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba nas /
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba nas /
translated: He will be reborn among the gods of the Heaven of the Four Great Kings.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way, he will be reborn

original: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams @33a *//🔽kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes so //
analyzed: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams @33a *// kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes so //
translated: among the gods of the Heaven of the Masters of Others’ Creations.

original: der gnas nas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /
analyzed: der gnas nas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /
translated: Having remained there, he will bring beings to maturity.

original: bde ba nye bar sgrub pa thams cad kyis sems can rnams la bsnyen bkur byed /
analyzed: bde ba nye bar sgrub pa thams cad kyis sems can rnams la bsnyen bkur byed /
translated: He will serve sentient beings with all the means of happiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed /
translated: He will purify a buddhafield.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mnyes par byed /🔽bkur sti byed /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mnyes par byed / bkur sti byed /
translated: He will please the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly awakened ones.🔽He will honor them,🔽esteem them,

original: bla mar byed /🔽ri mor byed /
analyzed: bla mar byed / ri mor byed /
translated: revere them,

original: mchod pa byed de /🔽nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: mchod pa byed de / nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: and make offerings to them.🔽He will not fall into the śrāvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur zhes bya bar shes te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur zhes bya bar shes te /
translated: “This bodhisattva will not turn back until he has attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.”

original: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no //
translated: Su­bhūti, this is the purity of the bodhisattvas’ eye of Dharma.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar shes te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar shes te /
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, the bodhisattva great beings should know that

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
translated: ‘this bodhisattva has been prophesied by the tathāgatas to attain unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,

original: 'di ni lung ma bstan to //
analyzed: 'di ni lung ma bstan to //
translated: but that one has not.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni rang gi don byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni rang gi don byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: These bodhisattvas will accomplish their own goals,

original: 'di dag ni byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di dag ni byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: but those will not.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyir ldog pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyir ldog pa'o //
translated: These bodhisattvas will turn back,

original: 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'o //
translated: but those will not.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i mngon par shes pa ni yongs su rdzogs @33b so; ;'di'i ni yongs su ma rdzogs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i mngon par shes pa ni yongs su rdzogs @33b so; ;'di'i ni yongs su ma rdzogs so //
translated: “This bodhisattva has perfected his superknowledges, but that one has not.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa dag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa dag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
translated: This bodhisattva, with his perfected superknowledges, will go to the world systems in the east, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river, in order to serve the tathāgatas,

original: phyir dang / bkur ster bya ba'i phyir dang / bla mar bya ba'i phyir dang / ri mor bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o //
analyzed: phyir dang / bkur ster bya ba'i phyir dang / bla mar bya ba'i phyir dang / ri mor bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o //
translated: to honor them, to revere them, to make offerings to them, to praise them, to adore them, and to seek the supreme, highest enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mngon par shes pa thob bo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mngon par shes pa thob bo //
translated: This bodhisattva has attained the superknowledges.

original: 'di ni 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That one will not attain them.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: This bodhisattva’s buddhafield will be completely purified when he attains enlightenment.

original: 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: This Buddha-field of his will not be completely purified.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas so //
translated: This Bodhisattva has brought beings to maturity.

original: 'dis ni yongs su smin par ma byas so //
analyzed: 'dis ni yongs su smin par ma byas so //
translated: This one has not.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsngags pa brjod par mdzad do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsngags pa brjod par mdzad do //
translated: In this Bodhisattva, the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, in world systems in the ten directions, numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, proclaim the praise.

original: 'di la ni brjod par mi mdzad do //
analyzed: 'di la ni brjod par mi mdzad do //
translated: In that one, they do not.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas so //
translated: These Bodhisattvas are near to the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones.

original: gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be near.

original: 'di dag ni nye bar mi gnas so //
analyzed: 'di dag ni nye bar mi gnas so //
translated: These are not near.

original: nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not be near.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i tshe ni dpag tu yod @34a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i tshe ni dpag tu yod @34a *//
translated: The time of the attainment of enlightenment by this Bodhisattva is limited.

original: par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is not limited.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i tshe ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i tshe ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: This Bodhisattva will attain Awakening in an immeasurable [number of] aeons.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The community of monks of this Bodhisattva who has attained Awakening will be immeasurable.

original: 'di ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: It will be immeasurable.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: The community of Bodhisattvas of this Bodhisattva who has attained Awakening will be immeasurable.

original: 'di ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: It will be immeasurable.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dka' ba spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dka' ba spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: This Bodhisattva will practice austerities.

original: 'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not practice austerities.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa yin no //
translated: This Bodhisattva is in his last existence.

original: 'di srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no //
translated: He is not in his last existence.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par 'gyur ro //
translated: This Bodhisattva will sit on the seat of Awakening.

original: 'di ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not sit [there].

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di la ni bdud 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di la ni bdud 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “This bodhisattva will have Māra.

original: 'di la ni bdud 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar shes pa ste /
analyzed: 'di la ni bdud 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar shes pa ste /
translated: This one will not have Māra.”

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no //
translated: Subhūti, that is the purity of the bodhisattva great beings’ divine eye.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, venerable Subhūti asked him,

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags /
translated: what is the purity of the bodhisattva great beings’ buddha eye?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems @34b dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis byang chub kyi sems kyi mjug thogs su rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems @34b dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis byang chub kyi sems kyi mjug thogs su rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
translated: “Subhūti, it is when a bodhisattva great being, right after the thought of awakening, has entered into the diamond-like concentration,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob la /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob la /
translated: and has attained the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan /
analyzed: de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan /
translated: He is endowed with the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan /
translated: endowed with the four fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan zhing /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gang gis kyang rnam pa thams cad du chos thams cad lam mthong ba'am /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gang gis kyang rnam pa thams cad du chos thams cad lam mthong ba'am /
translated: endowed with the four detailed and thorough knowledges, with great love, with great compassion, and with the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: ma thos pa'am /
analyzed: ma thos pa'am /
translated: “Subhūti, there is nothing whatsoever that the bodhisattva great being’s buddha eye does not see, does not hear,

original: mi dran pa'am /
analyzed: mi dran pa'am /
translated: does not know,

original: mngon par mi shes pa gang yang med pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par mi shes pa gang yang med pa ste /
translated: or does not understand in any way at all about all dharmas.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mig yongs su dag pa ni de lta bu ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mig yongs su dag pa ni de lta bu ste /
translated: Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being’s completely purified eye when he has fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is like that.

original: rab 'byor / de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i mig lnga po dag yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i mig lnga po dag yin no //
translated: These, Subhūti, are the five completely purified eyes of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga po de dag yongs su dag par byed pa ni go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga po de dag yongs su dag par byed pa ni go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings who purify these five eyes should be known as wearing the great armor.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said this to the Lord:

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @35a *//
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @35a *//
translated: “Lord,

original: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang dag la gnas par bgyi lags /
analyzed: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang dag la gnas par bgyi lags /
translated: what dharmas should the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom stand in?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang la'ang gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang la'ang gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in any dharmas at all.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gnas dang / gnas pa po dang / gnas par bya ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas dang / gnas pa po dang / gnas par bya ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the place, the one who stays, and the staying are not apprehended.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, the venerable Subhūti said to him,

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Reverend Lord!

original: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na /
analyzed: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na /
translated: As I understand the meaning of what the Lord has said,

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Reverend Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: should not stand in form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dag la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dag la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: Similarly, they should not stand in feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: mig la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: mig la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: They should not stand in the eyes.

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas par mi bgyi lags so; ;de bzhin du gzugs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas par mi bgyi lags so; ;de bzhin du gzugs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: Similarly, they should not dwell on sights.

original: de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: Similarly, they should not dwell on sounds, smells, tastes, textures, or mental phenomena.

original: @35b mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas /
analyzed: @35b mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas /
translated: They should not dwell on the eye consciousness,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: up to and including the mind consciousness.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: chos kyi khams kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: chos kyi khams kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so // mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: they should not dwell on the element of mental consciousness.🔽They should not dwell on eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas /
translated: They should not dwell on the sensation that arises from the condition of eye contact,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi zhing /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi zhing /
translated: up to and including the sensation that arises from the condition of mind contact.

original: sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not dwell on the earth element,

original: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not dwell on the water element, the fire element, or the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not dwell on the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not dwell on the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas /
analyzed: ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas /
translated: They should not dwell on ignorance, and so on, up to

original: rga shi'i par la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: rga shi'i par la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: they should not dwell on aging and death.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: 'di ltar / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: 'di ltar / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /
translated: form is empty of form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste /
translated: Similarly, feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are empty of consciousness.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /🔽gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags la /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das / gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags la /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,🔽the emptiness of form is not form,

original: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs ma mchis te /🔽gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la /
analyzed: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs ma mchis te / gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la /
translated: and form is not other than the emptiness of form.🔽Form itself is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs lags pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs lags pa'i slad du ste /
translated: and emptiness itself is form.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: rnam grangs des na @36a *//
analyzed: rnam grangs des na @36a *//
translated: For this reason,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: should not settle down in form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de rnam par shes pa ma lags la /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de rnam par shes pa ma lags la /
translated: The emptiness of feeling, the emptiness of perception, the emptiness of volitional factors, and the emptiness of consciousness are not consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa ma mchis te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa ma mchis te /
translated: Consciousness is not separate from the emptiness of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la; stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la; stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so //
translated: Consciousness itself is emptiness, and emptiness itself is consciousness.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: for this reason, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas /
analyzed: tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas /
translated: He should not dwell on feelings,

original: rnam par shes pa'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: and so on up to: he should not dwell on consciousness.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: And so on up to:

original: ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas /
analyzed: ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas /
translated: he should not dwell on ignorance,

original: rga shi'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: rga shi'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: and so on up to: he should not dwell on old age and death.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽'di ltar rga shi'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de rga shi ma lags la /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / 'di ltar rga shi'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de rga shi ma lags la /
translated: And why?🔽Because the emptiness of old age and death is not old age and death,

original: rga shi'i stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rga shi ma mchis te /🔽rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la /
analyzed: rga shi'i stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rga shi ma mchis te / rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la /
translated: and old age and death is not other than emptiness.🔽Old age and death itself is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang rga shi lags pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rga shi lags pa'i slad du ste /
translated: and emptiness itself is old age and death.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: rnam grangs des @36b na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: rnam grangs des @36b na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: for this reason, the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: rga shi'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: rga shi'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: should not dwell on old age and death.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: Moreover, a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: should not stand in the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la /
analyzed: 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la /
translated: Because the four establishments of mindfulness are empty of the four establishments of mindfulness.🔽Emptiness is not the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma mchis te /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma mchis te / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la /
translated: and the four establishments of mindfulness are not emptiness.🔽The four establishments of mindfulness themselves are emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams lags pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams lags pa'i slad du'o //
translated: and emptiness itself is the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: they should not stand in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis stong ste /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la /
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis stong ste / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la /
translated: Thus, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are empty of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.🔽Apart from the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, emptiness does not exist.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis te /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la /🔽stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma @37a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis te / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la / stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma @37a *//
translated: Apart from emptiness, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas do not exist.🔽The eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are themselves emptiness,

original: 'dres pa bco brgyad lags pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: 'dres pa bco brgyad lags pa'i slad du'o //
translated: and emptiness is itself the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: for these reasons, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi lags so ////
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi lags so ////
translated: should not stand in the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
translated: The noble Perfection of Wisdom in Ten Thousand Lines

original: bam po bcu gcig pa /
analyzed: bam po bcu gcig pa /
translated: Eleventh section

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: Furthermore, bodhisattva mahasattva practitioners of the perfection of wisdom

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi lags /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi lags /
translated: should not abide in the perfection of generosity.

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: Similarly, they should not abide in the perfection of discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /
translated: It is because up to the perfection of wisdom🔽is empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na stong pa nyid ma mchis la /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na stong pa nyid ma mchis la /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the perfection of wisdom.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis te /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang steng pa nyid lags la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis te / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang steng pa nyid lags la /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than emptiness.🔽The perfection of wisdom itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is the perfection of wisdom.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: rnam grangs des @37b na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: rnam grangs des @37b na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: for this reason, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas /
translated: should not stand in the perfection of generosity,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: and so on up to should not stand in the perfection of wisdom.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /🔽yig 'bru rnams la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas / yig 'bru rnams la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: further, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom🔽should not stand in the letters,

original: yi ge bsgrub pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: yi ge bsgrub pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: and should not stand in the accomplishment of the letters.

original: gcig brjod pa dang / gnyis brjod pa dang / mang po brjod pa'i bar dag la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gcig brjod pa dang / gnyis brjod pa dang / mang po brjod pa'i bar dag la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: they should not dwell on the expression of one, the expression of two, up to the expression of many.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar yig 'bru rnams ni yig 'bru rnams kyis stong pa'i slad du'o //🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: 'di ltar yig 'bru rnams ni yig 'bru rnams kyis stong pa'i slad du'o // de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Because letters are empty of letters.🔽In the same vein, as was said in the previous chapter,

original: le'u gong mar ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: le'u gong mar ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o //
translated: the same refrain should be applied here.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in the extrasensory powers.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste /🔽mngon par shes pa gang lags pa de ni stong pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste / mngon par shes pa gang lags pa de ni stong pa nyid ma lags /
translated: And why?🔽Because the extrasensory powers are empty of the extrasensory powers.🔽The extrasensory powers are not emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags shing /
analyzed: stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags shing /
translated: Emptiness is not the extrasensory powers.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la /
translated: emptiness is not other than the superknowledges,

original: @38a *// stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis te /🔽mngon par shes pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la /
analyzed: @38a *// stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis te / mngon par shes pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la /
translated: and the superknowledges are not other than emptiness.🔽The superknowledges themselves are emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams lags pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams lags pa'i slad du ste /
translated: and emptiness itself is the superknowledges.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Therefore, Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: for this reason the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: should not stand in the superknowledges.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: further, the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: should not stand in the notion that form is impermanent.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: Similarly, one should not dwell on the idea that feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are impermanent.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: If one were to ask why,

original: 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste /🔽gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gang lags pa de stong pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste / gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gang lags pa de stong pa nyid ma lags /
translated: it is because the impermanence of physical forms is empty of the impermanence of physical forms.🔽The impermanence of physical forms is not emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags /🔽gzugs mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags / gzugs mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la /
translated: Emptiness is not the impermanence of physical forms.🔽Apart from the impermanence of physical forms, there is no emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te / gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la /
translated: Apart from emptiness, there is no impermanence of physical forms.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid lags pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid lags pa'i slad du'o //
translated: The impermanence of physical forms is emptiness and emptiness is the impermanence of physical forms.

original: de @38b bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dag la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi ste /
analyzed: de @38b bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dag la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi ste /
translated: The same should be extensively applied to feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,🔽for these reasons,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /🔽gzugs mi rtag pa nyid nas /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas / gzugs mi rtag pa nyid nas /
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom🔽should not abide in the impermanence of form,

original: rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: up to the impermanence of consciousness.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la bde zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la bde zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: Thus, it should be applied: they should not abide in the statement that form up to consciousness is happiness.

original: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: They should not abide in the statement that form up to consciousness is suffering.

original: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la stong zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la stong zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: They should not abide in the statement that form up to consciousness is empty.

original: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la mtshan ma ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la mtshan ma ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: One should not dwell on the idea that form up to consciousness is signless.

original: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la smon pa ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la smon pa ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: One should not dwell on the idea that form up to consciousness is wishless.

original: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la zhi zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la zhi zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: One should not dwell on the idea that form up to consciousness is calm.

original: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la dben zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //🔽gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la dben zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so // gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: One should not dwell on the idea that form up to consciousness is void.🔽One should not dwell on the idea that form up to consciousness is afflicted.

original: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i @39a *//🔽bar la skye ba ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i @39a *// bar la skye ba ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: One should not dwell on the idea that form up to consciousness is purified.🔽One should not dwell on the idea that form up to consciousness is arising.

original: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la 'gag pa ma mchis zhes bgyi par gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la 'gag pa ma mchis zhes bgyi par gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: One should not dwell on the idea that form up to consciousness is ceasing.

original: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: “One should not stand in the notion that ‘form is not a thing.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: gzugs kyi phung por ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung por ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o //
translated: Because it is to be applied in the same way as it is taught in the case of the aggregate of form.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: “Moreover, Reverend Lord,

original: chos kyi de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: chos kyi de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not stand in the real nature of phenomena.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽'di ltar chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste; chos kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / 'di ltar chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste; chos kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la /
translated: And why?🔽Because the real nature of phenomena is empty of the real nature of phenomena. Apart from the real nature of phenomena,

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis te /
translated: the emptiness does not exist, and apart from the emptiness,🔽the real nature of phenomena does not exist.

original: chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags /
analyzed: chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags /
translated: The real nature of phenomena is emptiness,🔽and emptiness is the real nature of phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi de bzhin nyid lags pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi de bzhin nyid lags pa'i slad du'o //
translated: Because emptiness is the suchness of phenomena.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: for these reasons, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: chos kyi de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas /
analyzed: chos kyi de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas /
translated: should not abide in the suchness of phenomena,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and similarly, connect this with each,

original: chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i @39b mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i @39b mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: should not abide in the dharma-constituent, the establishment of phenomena, the certification of phenomena, the very limit of reality, or the inconceivable element.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o //
analyzed: snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o //
translated: It is because it is just as before.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: further, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not abide in all the dhāraṇī gateways or all the meditative stabilization gateways.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste /
translated: It is because the dhāraṇī gateways and the samādhi gateways are empty of the dhāraṇī gateways and the samādhi gateways.

original: snga ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi'o //
translated: This should be extensively applied as before.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin par gyur pa'i yid kyis gzugs la spyod cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin par gyur pa'i yid kyis gzugs la spyod cing /
translated: Bodhisattvas who are unskilled in means, when practicing the perfection of wisdom, engage with form with a mind that has the grasping of self and the grasping of ‘mine.’

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na /
translated: Similarly, when they engage with feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness,

original: de lta na gzugs mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags shing /
analyzed: de lta na gzugs mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags shing /
translated: then they engage in the accumulation of form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / 'du shes mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags te /🔽mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin cing /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / 'du shes mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags te / mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin cing /
translated: Similarly, they are practicing with regard to the formation of feelings, the formation of perceptions, the formation of formative predispositions, and the formation of consciousness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la @40a *//🔽rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ma lags te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la @40a *// rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ma lags te /
translated: Those who practice with regard to the formation of consciousness do not acquire the transcendent perfection of wisdom,🔽and they do not engage in union with the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so //
translated: Without perfecting the transcendent perfection of wisdom, they will not attain emancipation in omniscience.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Reverend Lord!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: When bodhisattvas practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs la mi mkhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin par gyur pa'i yid kyis de gzugs la spyod cing /
analyzed: thabs la mi mkhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin par gyur pa'i yid kyis de gzugs la spyod cing /
translated: Through lack of skill in means, with a mind that has fallen into the view of the transitory collection, they engage with form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na /
translated: Similarly, they engage with feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.

original: de ltar na gzugs mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags shing /
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags shing /
translated: In that case, they engage with the formative activity of form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / 'du shes mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags la /🔽mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / 'du shes mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags la / mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags /
translated: Similarly, they engage with the formative activity of feeling, the formative activity of perception, the formative activity of formation, and the formative activity of consciousness.🔽Engaging with formative activity, they do not take hold of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ma lags te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ma lags te /
translated: They do not practice yoga in the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so //
translated: Without perfecting the perfection of wisdom, one will not attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa @40b dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa'i yid kyis de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa @40b dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa'i yid kyis de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: When a bodhisattva practicing the perfection of wisdom, unskilled in means, with a mind grasping at self and grasping at things, up to

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi bar la spyod na gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags te /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi bar la spyod na gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags te /
translated: practicing the dhāraṇī gateways and the meditative stabilization gateways, practices the accumulation of the dhāraṇī gateways and the meditative stabilization gateways,

original: mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags /
translated: practicing the accumulation does not uphold the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ma lags te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ma lags te /
translated: and does not practice yoga in the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni /
translated: Without perfecting the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so //
translated: one will not go forth to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis /
translated: It is because form is ungraspable,

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o //
translated: and similarly, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are ungraspable.

original: gzugs kyi gzung ba ma mchis pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du gzugs ma lags so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi gzung ba ma mchis pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du gzugs ma lags so //
translated: That ungraspability of form is not form because of the emptiness of its own mark.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba gang lags pa dang / 'du shes gang lags pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du rnam par shes pa ma lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba gang lags pa dang / 'du shes gang lags pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du rnam par shes pa ma lags so //
translated: Similarly, that ungraspability of whatever is feeling, whatever is perception, whatever are volitional factors, and whatever is consciousness is not consciousness because of the emptiness of its own mark.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin sgo rnams ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so //🔽gzungs @41a *// kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin sgo rnams ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so // gzungs @41a *// kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways and the meditative stabilization gateways are not apprehended.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ma lags so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ma lags so //
translated: The nonapprehension of the dhāraṇī gateways and the meditative stabilization gateways is not the dhāraṇī gateways and the meditative stabilization gateways because of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is also not apprehended because of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom like that

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par nye bar brtag par bgyi ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par nye bar brtag par bgyi ste /
translated: should investigate all phenomena as empty of essential nature.

original: ci nas kyang chos gang la'ang yid rnam par rgyu bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar nye bar brtag par bgyi ste /
analyzed: ci nas kyang chos gang la'ang yid rnam par rgyu bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar nye bar brtag par bgyi ste /
translated: One should investigate in such a way that the mind does not move towards any dharma at all.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad yangs pa /
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad yangs pa /
translated: That is the bodhisattva great beings’ vast,

original: tshad ma mchis pa /
analyzed: tshad ma mchis pa /
translated: boundless,

original: tshad ma nges pa /
analyzed: tshad ma nges pa /
translated: uncertain,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'o //
translated: uncommon field of provisions for the maṇḍala of the samādhi of no attachment.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang / de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang / de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang /
translated: “That knowledge of all aspects is also because of inner emptiness, because of outer emptiness, because of outer and inner emptiness, because of the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /🔽@41b dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / @41b dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the great, the emptiness of the ultimate, the emptiness of the conditioned, the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless,🔽the emptiness of nonrepudiation, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so //
translated: the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: “Why is that?

original: de ni mtshan mas bsgrub par bgyi ba ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: de ni mtshan mas bsgrub par bgyi ba ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
translated: It is because it is not accomplished by marks.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mtshan ma ni nyon mongs pa lags pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma ni nyon mongs pa lags pa'i slad du'o //
translated: because the signs are afflictions.

original: mtshan ma'ang gang lags she na /
analyzed: mtshan ma'ang gang lags she na /
translated: What are the signs?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so //
analyzed: gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so //
translated: Form is a sign.

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos ni mtshan ma lags so //
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos ni mtshan ma lags so //
translated: Sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental objects are signs.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma lags so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma lags so //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are signs.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi bar du ni mtshan ma lags te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi bar du ni mtshan ma lags te /
translated: Up to the gateways of samādhi are signs.

original: de ni mtshan ma zhes bgyi'o //
analyzed: de ni mtshan ma zhes bgyi'o //
translated: That is called a sign.

original: nyon mongs pa'ang de lags te /🔽de ni gzung bar mi bgyi /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'ang de lags te / de ni gzung bar mi bgyi /
translated: Afflictions are also that.🔽They should not be grasped at

original: goms par mi bgyi lags so //
analyzed: goms par mi bgyi lags so //
translated: and should not be cultivated.

original: de lta ma lags na ni /
analyzed: de lta ma lags na ni /
translated: If that were not so,

original: kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la dad par mi 'gyur lags so //
analyzed: kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la dad par mi 'gyur lags so //
translated: even the wandering mendicant Vṛji would not have faith in this omniscient wisdom.

original: dad pa de'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: dad pa de'ang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that faith?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yid ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / brten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yid ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / brten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa ste /
translated: It is to have confidence in this perfection of wisdom, to be curious about it, to be interested in it, to rely on it, to reflect on it, to evaluate it, and to investigate it.

original: de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags te /🔽de ltar na mtshan ma de gzung bar mi @42a *//
analyzed: de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags te / de ltar na mtshan ma de gzung bar mi @42a *//
translated: Moreover, it is not in the manner of signs.

original: bgyi lags so //
analyzed: bgyi lags so //
translated: In that way, those signs should not be grasped.

original: kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang zhing rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du shes pas zhugs nas /
analyzed: kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang zhing rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du shes pas zhugs nas /
translated: The wandering mendicant Vṛji, having been interested, followed with faith, and having entered through knowing the emptiness of inherent nature,

original: gzugs yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: gzugs yongs su ma bzung /
translated: did not grasp form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan mar yongs su ma bzung ba lags so //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan mar yongs su ma bzung ba lags so //
translated: He did not grasp feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness as a sign.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar de la rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la yongs su gzung ba mi skye ba'i slad du'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar de la rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la yongs su gzung ba mi skye ba'i slad du'o //
translated: It is because grasping does not arise for phenomena that are empty of their own marks.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar des shes pa de nang gi mngon par rtogs pa thob pas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽phyi'i mngon par rtogs pa thob pa dang / phyi nang gi mngon par rtogs pa thob pas shes pa de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong la /
analyzed: 'di ltar des shes pa de nang gi mngon par rtogs pa thob pas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi'i mngon par rtogs pa thob pa dang / phyi nang gi mngon par rtogs pa thob pas shes pa de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong la /
translated: In this way, they do not see that cognition as something that is attained internally,🔽or as something that is attained externally, or as something that is attained both internally and externally.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de shes pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o //🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de shes pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o // de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: It is because they do not see that cognition as something that is attained other than cognition and realization, because of the emptiness of internal phenomena,🔽and because of the emptiness of external phenomena, and because of the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena.

original: 'di ltar des gang gis shes par bgyid pa dang / gang shes par bgyid pa dang / gang las shes par bgyi ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar des gang gis shes par bgyid pa dang / gang shes par bgyid pa dang / gang las shes par bgyi ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
translated: If you ask why, it is because they do not see any phenomenon that is cognized, any cognition, or anything that is cognized.

original: shes pa de gzugs nas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: shes pa de gzugs nas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: They do not see that cognition as being internal, from form to feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.

original: shes pa de gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi phyi rol @42b tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: shes pa de gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi phyi rol @42b tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He did not see consciousness as external, from form to consciousness.

original: shes pa de gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi nang dang / phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: shes pa de gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi nang dang / phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He did not see consciousness as internal or external, from form to consciousness.

original: gzugs las gzhan du shes pa de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: gzugs las gzhan du shes pa de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He did not see consciousness as other than form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He did not see consciousness as other than feeling, perception, or volitional factors.

original: shes pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o //
analyzed: shes pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o //
translated: He did not see consciousness as other than consciousness.

original: rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs mos par gyur te /
analyzed: rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs mos par gyur te /
translated: In this enumeration, the wandering mendicant Kaineya became a faithful one.

original: de chos 'di la mos nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dad pas rjes su 'brang bar gyur to //
analyzed: de chos 'di la mos nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dad pas rjes su 'brang bar gyur to //
translated: Having faith in this Dharma, he became a follower through faith in the state of omniscience.

original: de lta bas na chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du chos nyid tshad mar bgyis nas /
analyzed: de lta bas na chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du chos nyid tshad mar bgyis nas /
translated: Therefore, because all phenomena are not apprehended, one should rely on the authority of reality.

original: mtshan ma yid la mi bgyid pas ci nas kyang des chos gang yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa de ltar mos lags so //🔽chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du des gang gzung bar bgyi ba'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma yid la mi bgyid pas ci nas kyang des chos gang yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa de ltar mos lags so // chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du des gang gzung bar bgyi ba'am /
translated: They should not pay attention to signs, and should believe that they do not apprehend anything at all.

original: gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs te /
analyzed: gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs te /
translated: Because all phenomena are not apprehended, they do not apprehend any dharma that they should grasp or reject.

original: chos thams cad rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: chos thams cad rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: Because all phenomena are without conceit,

original: de mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid lags so //
analyzed: de mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid lags so //
translated: they do not even have conceit about nirvāṇa.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Reverend Lord!

original: chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: Because all phenomena are not apprehended,

original: gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin cing /
analyzed: gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin cing /
translated: they do not grasp at form,

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / @43a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / @43a *//
