analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te / gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab @49a *//
translated: If a bodhisattva thinks, ‘Whoever practices in this way is cultivating the transcendent perfection of wisdom,’🔽then he is practicing a sign.

original: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o snyam na /
analyzed: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o snyam na /
translated: If he thinks, ‘Whoever practices in this way is cultivating the transcendent perfection of wisdom,’

original: de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te /
analyzed: de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te /
translated: then he is practicing a sign.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas pa lags par rig par bgyi lags so //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas pa lags par rig par bgyi lags so //
translated: One should know that this is a great bodhisattva being’s lack of skill in means.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra:

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: when bodhisattvas practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: gal te gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos /
analyzed: gal te gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos /
translated: if they stand in form and aspire to it,

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos la /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos la /
translated: and likewise stand in feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness and aspire to them,

original: de gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa na /
analyzed: de gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa na /
translated: if they stand in form and aspire to it, and likewise stand in feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness and aspire to them,

original: gzugs kyi mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyi mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin /
translated: they engage in the production of form,

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin no //
translated: Similarly, they engage with the formative predispositions of feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness.

original: gzugs kyi mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa nas rnam par shes pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i bar la spyod na de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la skye ba las yongs su mi thar zhing /
analyzed: gzugs kyi mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa nas rnam par shes pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i bar la spyod na de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la skye ba las yongs su mi thar zhing /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra, if they engage with the formative predispositions of physical forms, and similarly, if they engage with the formative predispositions of , up to and including consciousness, then I say that they will not be liberated from birth in future existences,

original: de ni rga ba nas 'khrug pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o //
analyzed: de ni rga ba nas 'khrug pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o //
translated: and that they will not be liberated from aging, and so forth, up to and including conflict and suffering.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzhan yang byang @49b chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na thabs la mi mkhas pas mig la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas /🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang @49b chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na thabs la mi mkhas pas mig la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: if, moreover, when bodhisattvas practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, they are unskilled in means, and if they abide in the eyes, and so forth, up to and including the mental faculty, and if they are fully aware of them, and if they are convinced of them,

original: yid kyi bar la gnas shing kun tu shes te mngon par zhen la mos par byed na /
analyzed: yid kyi bar la gnas shing kun tu shes te mngon par zhen la mos par byed na /
translated: and similarly, if they abide in the eyes, and so forth, up to and including the mental faculty, and if they are fully aware of them, and if they are attached to them, and if they are convinced of them,

original: de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o //
analyzed: de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o //
translated: I say that they will not be completely free from suffering in future lives.

original: de bzhin du gal te gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du gal te gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Similarly, if they dwell on form, knowing it and being intent on it, and so on,

original: gal te chos kyi bar la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed na /
analyzed: gal te chos kyi bar la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed na /
translated: up to if they dwell on mental phenomena, knowing them and being intent on them,

original: de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o //
analyzed: de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o //
translated: I say that they will not be completely free from suffering in future lives.

original: gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed na /
analyzed: gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed na /
translated: If they dwell on the conditions for the arising of feelings from the contact of the eye up to the conditions for the arising of feelings from the contact of the mind,

original: de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o //
analyzed: de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o //
translated: I say that they will not be completely free from suffering in future lives.🔽If they dwell on the applications of mindfulness, knowing them and being intent on them, and so on,

original: gal te dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas /
analyzed: gal te dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas /
translated: up to

original: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed na /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed na /
translated: Similarly, up to and including the noble eightfold path, and from the ten powers of the tathāgatas up to and including the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, if they stand in them, understand them, and are intent on them,

original: de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o //🔽de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar bar kho bo smra'o // de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: I say that in their next lives they will not be liberated from suffering.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang mngon sum du bya ba'i skal pa'ang med na /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang mngon sum du bya ba'i skal pa'ang med na /
translated: They will not even have the good fortune to actualize the level of the śrāvakas,🔽let alone the level of the pratyekabuddhas,

original: @50a *// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
analyzed: @50a *// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
translated: let alone fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ni gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni gnas med do //
translated: That is not possible.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
translated: if bodhisattvas practice the perfection of wisdom in that way,

original: thabs la mi mkhas pa dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: thabs la mi mkhas pa dang ldan zhing /
translated: they are not skilled in means,

original: thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that they are unskilled in means.

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: The venerable Śāradvatīputra then said to the venerable Su­bhūti as follows:

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /🔽ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: “Venerable Su­bhūti!

original: thabs la mkhas par rig par bya /🔽de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: thabs la mkhas par rig par bya / de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: How should one know that great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom are skilled in means?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra!

original: gzugs la mi spyod /
analyzed: gzugs la mi spyod /
translated: When great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom do not engage with physical forms,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod /
translated: and they do not engage with feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness,

original: gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod /
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the characteristics of form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod /🔽gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod / gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am /
translated: They do not engage with the characteristics of feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness.🔽They do not engage with the notion that form is permanent

original: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: or that it is impermanent.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya @50b ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya @50b ba'am /
translated: Similarly, they do not engage with the notion that feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness is permanent

original: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod / gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or that it is impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the notion that form is happiness

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or that it is suffering.🔽Similarly, they do not engage with the notion that feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness is happiness

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽gzugs bdag yod ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod / gzugs bdag yod ces bya ba'am /
translated: or that it is suffering.🔽They do not engage with the notion that form is a self

original: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: or that it is not a self.🔽Similarly, they do not engage with the notion that feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness is a self

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang; rnam par shes pa bdag yod ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang; rnam par shes pa bdag yod ces bya ba'am /
translated: or that it is not a self.

original: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod / gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am /
translated: They do not engage with ‘selflessness.’

original: mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am /
translated: They do not engage with ‘form is empty’ or ‘form is not empty.’

original: mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod / gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am /
translated: Similarly, they do not engage with ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness is empty’ or ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness is not empty.’

original: mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am /
translated: They do not engage with ‘form has a sign’ or ‘form is signless.’

original: mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod / gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba'am /
translated: Similarly, they do not engage with ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness has a sign’ or ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness is signless.’

original: smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with ‘form has wishes’ or ‘form is wishless.’

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba'am /🔽smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba'am / smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: Similarly, they do not engage with ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness has wishes’ or ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness is wishless.’

original: gzugs zhi zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: gzugs zhi zhes bya ba'am /
translated: They do not engage with ‘form is calm’ or ‘form is not calm.’

original: ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that it is not calm.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am /
translated: Similarly, they do not engage with the notions that feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are calm,

original: ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽gzugs @51a *// dben zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / gzugs @51a *// dben zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or that they are not calm.🔽They do not engage with the notion that physical forms are void,

original: mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: or that they are not void.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba'am /
translated: Similarly, they do not engage with the notions that feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are void,

original: mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽gzugs kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod / gzugs kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or that they are not void.🔽They do not engage with the notion that physical forms are afflicted,

original: rnam par byang zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: rnam par byang zhes bya bar mi spyod / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or that they are purified.🔽Similarly, they do not engage with the notions that feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are afflicted,

original: rnam par byang zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽gzugs skye zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: rnam par byang zhes bya bar mi spyod / gzugs skye zhes bya ba'am /
translated: or that they are purified.🔽They do not engage with the notion that physical forms arise,

original: mi skye zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: mi skye zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: or that they do not arise.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba'am /
translated: Similarly, they do not engage with the idea that feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are produced,

original: mi skye zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽gzugs 'gag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi skye zhes bya bar mi spyod / gzugs 'gag ces bya ba'am /
translated: or that they are not produced.🔽They do not engage with the idea that physical forms cease,

original: mi 'gag ces bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: mi 'gag ces bya bar mi spyod /
translated: or that they do not cease.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'gag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'gag ces bya ba'am /
translated: Similarly, they do not engage with the idea that feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness cease,

original: mi 'gag ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽gzugs dngos po yod ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: mi 'gag ces bya bar mi spyod / gzugs dngos po yod ces bya ba'am /
translated: or that they do not cease.🔽They do not engage with the idea that physical forms are entities,

original: dngos po med ces bya bar mi spyod /🔽de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: dngos po med ces bya bar mi spyod / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya ba'am /
translated: or that they are non-entities.🔽Similarly, they do not engage with the idea that feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are entities,

original: dngos po med ces bya bar mi spyod pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po med ces bya bar mi spyod pa ste /
translated: or that they are non-entities.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom in this way,

original: thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that this is skillful means.

original: de @51b ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de @51b ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,🔽it is because the emptiness of form is not form.🔽Emptiness is not other than form,

original: gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med de /
analyzed: gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med de /
translated: and form is not other than emptiness.🔽Form itself is emptiness,

original: gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la /🔽stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang; rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la / stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang; rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin /
translated: and emptiness itself is form.🔽Similarly, the emptiness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med de /🔽stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med de / stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin la /
translated: Emptiness is not other than feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness,🔽and feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not other than emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness themselves are emptiness.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med /
translated: The emptiness of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.🔽Emptiness is not other than the applications of mindfulness.

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med de /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med de / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong pa nyid yin la /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not other than emptiness.🔽Emptiness is the applications of mindfulness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yin no //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are emptiness.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de /
translated: In the same way,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin /🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med /
translated: the emptiness of the noble eightfold path is not the noble eightfold path.🔽The noble eightfold path is not other than emptiness.

original: @52a *// stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med de /
analyzed: @52a *// stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la /
translated: The eightfold noble path is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin no //
translated: Emptiness is also the eightfold noble path.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar yang gzhan ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar yang gzhan ma yin / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med /
translated: In the same way, the ten powers of the tathāgatas are not one thing, and emptiness another.🔽Emptiness is not one thing, and the ten powers of the tathāgatas another.🔽Apart from the ten powers of the tathāgatas there is no emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med de /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nyid stong pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med de / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nyid stong pa nyid yin la /
translated: and apart from emptiness there are no ten powers of the tathāgatas.🔽The ten powers of the tathāgatas are emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yin no //🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yin no // de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and emptiness is the ten powers of the tathāgatas.🔽In the same way, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not one thing, and emptiness another.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is not the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med /🔽stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med / stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med de /
translated: emptiness is not other than the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,🔽and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not other than emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la /
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are themselves emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yin no //
translated: and emptiness itself is the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na spyod do @52b zhes bya bar khas mi len /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na spyod do @52b zhes bya bar khas mi len /
translated: if bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not accept that they practice,

original: mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len /🔽spyod kyang spyod la /🔽mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar khas mi len /🔽spyod pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len / spyod kyang spyod la / mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar khas mi len / spyod pa'ang ma yin /
translated: do not accept that they do not practice,🔽do not accept that they both practice and do not practice,🔽and do not accept that they neither practice nor do not practice,

original: mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar khas mi len na /
analyzed: mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar khas mi len na /
translated: then,🔽Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: A bodhisattva who practices the perfection of wisdom in this way

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: is fortunate to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: When this was said, the venerable Śāradvatī­putra asked the venerable Su­bhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Su­bhūti,

original: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na thams cad du khas mi len /
analyzed: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na thams cad du khas mi len /
translated: why is it that when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not accept anything at all?”

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Su­bhūti replied, “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: it is because the essential nature of the perfection of wisdom cannot be apprehended.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the perfection of wisdom has the nature of being a non-entity.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na khas mi len to //🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽spyod pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na khas mi len to // de bzhin du sbyar te / spyod pa'ang ma yin /
translated: for this reason, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not accept anything.🔽In the same way, they do not accept anything up to

original: mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya ba de lta bur yang khas mi len to //
analyzed: mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya ba de lta bur yang khas mi len to //
translated: neither practice nor non-practice.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / gzung ba med pa'i phyir te /🔽'di ni byang chub sems @53a *//
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / gzung ba med pa'i phyir te / 'di ni byang chub sems @53a *//
translated: Because all phenomena are included in the nature of non-entities, and because there is nothing to grasp.

original: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin /
analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin /
translated: This is the samādhi of bodhisattva great beings.

original: chos thams cad nye bar len pa med pa rgya che ba'i yo byad tshad med par gtogs pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad nye bar len pa med pa rgya che ba'i yo byad tshad med par gtogs pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste /
translated: All phenomena are without appropriation, and they are included in the immeasurable vast equipment that is not shared in common with all the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid dang ma bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid dang ma bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who is not separated from this very meditative stabilization

original: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o ////
analyzed: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o ////
translated: will quickly and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
translated: The Noble Perfection of Wisdom in Ten Thousand Lines

original: bam po bcu gnyis pa /
analyzed: bam po bcu gnyis pa /
translated: Scroll Twelve

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said this to the venerable Su­bhūti:

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Su­bhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di kho na dang ma bral zhing ldan pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di kho na dang ma bral zhing ldan pa /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who are not separated from this very meditative stabilization,

original: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am /
analyzed: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am /
translated: Will they quickly fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: 'on te ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis kyang 'tshang rgya /
analyzed: 'on te ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis kyang 'tshang rgya /
translated: Or will they also fully awaken through other meditative stabilizations?”

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis de la smras pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis de la smras pa /
translated: The venerable Subhūti said to him,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: bodhisattva great beings standing in other meditative stabilizations will also quickly fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: He said, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: ting nge 'dzin gang dag la gnas na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang dag la gnas na /
translated: standing in which meditative stabilizations

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @53b myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @53b myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
translated: will bodhisattva great beings quickly fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: He said, “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “There is a meditative absorption called ‘heroic progress’ that bodhisattva great beings have.

original: de la gnas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: de la gnas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: If they rest in that, bodhisattva great beings will quickly and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: there is a meditative absorption called ‘precious seal.’

original: seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //🔽zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do // zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a meditative absorption called ‘lion’s play.’🔽There is a meditative absorption called ‘excellent moon.’

original: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a meditative absorption called ‘moon’s victory banner.’

original: chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi called Most Exalted over All Dharmas, the samādhi called Invisible Crown of the Head, the samādhi called Ascertained in the Sphere of Phenomena, the samādhi called Ascertained Victory Banner,

original: nges pa'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: nges pa'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi called Ascertained Peak, the samādhi called Vajra-like, the samādhi called Dharma-mudrā Avataṃsaka, the samādhi called Abiding Like the King of Samādhis,

original: rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i @54a *//
analyzed: rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i @54a *//
translated: the absorption of the king’s seal, the absorption of the power of diligence, the absorption of perfect nobility, the absorption of certainty,

original: tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dvags la 'jug cing phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dvags la 'jug cing phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

translated: the samadhi called Non-apprehending, the samadhi called Endowed with the Best of All Aspects, the samadhi called Not Rejoicing in Any Happiness or Suffering,

original: rnam pa zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra bsgrags pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rnam pa zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra bsgrags pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the meditative absorption of inexhaustible aspects, the meditative absorption of dhāraṇī intelligence, the meditative absorption of the elimination of all that is right and wrong, the meditative absorption of engaging in the proclamation of sound,

translated: the meditative absorption of the absence of conflict and cessation, the meditative absorption of stainless light, the meditative absorption of possessing the essence, the meditative absorption of the stainless light of the full moon,
